amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to the Older Americans Act of 1965, which may include congregate and home-delivered meals programs, or other assistance to low-income seniors.

vote.text: Amendment SA 594 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 594 proposed by Senator Sanders.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 594 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 594 proposed by Senator Sanders.
